column2: Glad to see you! We've got a bit of a situation here. We have to rescue Riley! Can you help us?
Riley was poking around in a restricted area and plummeted into some kind of portal!

I thought that blasted thing was deactivated a thousand blue moons ago. Now it's caught Riley! 

This contraption is supposed to capture data threats, not our own Conservatory students!
Knowing Riley, she'll find a way to communicate with us! We all need to work together to find her!

The challenge we face is that the box is locked down tight with a triple passcode protocol. 

The codes are embedded on 3 small tags, or "fobs," hidden deep in Fizzics and Lightspeed.
Our job is to get to each of those levels and retrieve the coded fobs and open those panels!
OK, hope you come back soon!
